name: Animation to Path
description:
Hello, warriors!


Keep on sharing with you my experience in complex mechanics especially animation using Figma app.

So I prepared this shot which took a lot of time and efforts but worth it.

In this shot I want to notice 2 mechanics:

1. Complex shapes of components. (bacteria)

2. Frame-by-frame animation along the guide.

You can check out prototype in higher resolution or learn more about mechanics on the below.
